mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_ID, E.CO_CD, E.DEPT_CD, E.EMP_EML_ADDR, E.EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_ZIP, E.EMP_ADDR, E.EMP_DADDR, E.EMP_TELNO, E.EMP_BRDT, EMP_GNDR, E.EMP_NTN, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_RSGNTN_YMD, E.EMP_CRT_YMD, E.EMP_MDFCN_YMD, E.ENABLED, E.EMP_DLN_YN, E.IMG_FILE_URL, E.EMP_DEL_YN, E.TEAM_CD, C.CO_NM, C.CO_REG_DT, C.CO_CNT, C.CO_BRNO, C.CO_ZIP, C.CO_ADDR, C.CO_DADDR, C.CO_TEL, C.CEO_NM, D.DEPT_NM, D.DEPT_CRT_DT, DEPT_ACTVTN_YN, D.DEPT_IMG_FILE_URL, T.TEAM_NM, T.TEAM_CRT_DT, T.TEAM_ACTVTN_YN, E.JBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM, A.AUTHRITY_NO, A.AUTHRITY_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON E.CO_CD = C.CO_CD LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD LEFT JOIN JOBGRADE J ON E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD LEFT JOIN AUTHRITY A ON E.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId}
